title: Women representation in law firms
summary: This chart shows the percentage of Women represented in law Sector in Women .
We can see that there are less Women than men working in Law_Firms , and an equal amount of men and Women in Financial_Groups .
However there are a higher percentage of Women working in Tech and Insurance .
gold: The graph shows the representation of woman in different sectors . This shows that women are less likely to be employed by law firms than financial groups , tech and insurance .
